Had my last flights in the Navy this week.  On Monday flew the mighty Big Iron MH-53E from the Blackhawks of HM-15; today flew the MH-60S with the Nightdippers of HSC-5 - both squadrons I have had the honor commanding in the past.  What a fantastic few days for me to wrap up nearly 25 years in the Navy!
This is how an #Employeestruggle for his #Company...
But the management won't let them do what they are for...

An anonymous person emailed me to let me know that they had an issue with me championing women's workplace issues on LinkedIn. Yes, I do this unapologetically, but not at the exclusion of my advocacy for all  students, regardless of gender. My recommendations on here come from women and men alike. Anyone who truly knows me knows that I am first, a mother of two boys and that I entered into a career in higher education to open doors of opportunity for ALL people and I have done that in the thousands over my 17-year career. It is difficult to be mischaracterized, but less so when you know yourself well. I hope that everyone can feel free to have open dialogue about the issues that affect them most.
Words of inspiration!!! Are you strong enough like Sean?

Here's to our 10th LinkedIn #WomenConnect event!  We are creating impact by scaling our mission for more women in tech by building communities across companies to share ideas and come together for change. Thank you for sharing your stories! #LinkedInWIT #CommunityOverCompetition Thogori Karago Liz Morgan Andrea Carlos Alyssa Leong Ya Xu Sherry Shah Brendan Browne Aatif Awan Kapil Surlaker Pete Davies Suja Viswesan Nadia Fawaz Laukik Watve Vivien Sin Sukhdeep (Sid) Sidhu Kamilah Taylor  #WomenInTech. • Managed the end to end recruitment process from searching candidates, interviewing, reference checks, salary negotiations, visa processing, managing HR documents and closing the candidates. • Conducted searches on existing job portals (Dice, Monster, TechFetch, CareerBuilder etc), groups (Yahoo, Google), contact lists, internal databases, networking and employee referrals.• Developed new ideas to create resourcing strategies.• Sourced passive candidates through networking, cold calling, internet searches and research (via LinkedIn).• Partnered with recruiters to generate ideas, leverage resources and share information that facilitates an effective search process.• Documented and maintained resumes in CATS (applicant tracking system).• Sourced for talent and managed client accounts via FieldGlass VMS such as INTEL, McAfee, Informatica, PG&E, Asurion & Cyclotron etc. and developing relationship with existing clients.• Developed job descriptions, objectives and candidate profiles for internal hires.• Assisted in various HR related work.

• Drive the delivery process to closure for permanent, consulting and right-to-hire career opportunities for local and national accounts in a high-volume corporate environment. • Perform client-focused selling, presenting qualified candidates to clients.• Facilitate the hiring process: manage interviews, offer negotiation, presentation, candidate closing, requisition/applicant tracking.• Build and maintain successful client relationships via thorough and consistent correspondenceTrack and monitor status of IT professionals currently on projects.• Administer employee counseling and progressive discipline.• Work autonomously and within the team to meet/exceed sales and ethical standards

•	Full-life cycle recruiting for Big 4 Financial Advisory firm Ernst & Young and other direct Semiconductor, Computer-Software and Social-Media Clients like Intel, Facebook, Intuit, Capco in US market.•	Handling a team of recruiters along with hands-on recruiting.•	Interface effectively with all levels of management.•	Phone screening, face to face interviews, I negotiated salaries made reference checks; conversed with hiring manager/ VMO Coordinator/PC for daily the consensus of the position and salary along with the qualifications of the candidate.•	Having pro-active database of 100+ candidates active.•	Contact candidates for availability and interest, and schedule interviews•	Maintain contact with candidates as they proceed through the hiring process.•	Prepare all candidate documentation (Letter of Intent /LOI) and format resumes for client.•	Verify candidates' qualifications and check references.•	Ability to write employment postings to attract qualified candidates.•	Input and update information into recruiting database.•	Negotiate salary requirements. Provide benefits briefing to candidates following interview.•	Approve, write and submit offer letters•	Facilitates the new-hire process including orientation, coordination of physical examinations/drug testing and ensuring the appropriate and timely processing of new-hire paperwork.•	Establish and maintain solid relationships with a variety of recruiting sources•	Working on different positions like CTO, Director, Sr.Manager/Manager (Advisory Services), Solutions Architect, Big Data Architect, Project/Program Managers, Business analyst, On semiconductor side working on Verification Engineer/Manager, Validation Engineer/Manager, FPGA Engineer/Manager and many other positions.

-Manufacturing of Electrical Panels which are used in industries having high power consumption. -Designing of Automatic Power Factor Control Panels (APFC), Metering Panels, Distribution Boards & all other accessories which are to be needed for Power Supply in newly constructed factories.-Liasioning  & Commissioning of LT/HT transmission lines from State Electricity Board. -Testing, wiring & commissioning of industrial systems.-Fault Finding on Real time Applications-Onsite Practical exposure on live project & Industry

summary: Who am I? That's an easy question -I help companies and build teams that won't accept anything other than growth, profitability, and customer loyalty. -I believe that the key to great business results is to get great people, then do cool stuff to maximize their motivation, performance, and effectiveness.What do we do? That's an easy question as well -We help those along this journey to facilitate their goals, and provide independent oversight that draws upon our combined experiences so as to ensure the greatest likelihood of success overall.
